mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE source_id=#{sourceId} AND auth_source=#{authSource} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id=#{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT u.id as u_id, u.source_id as u_source_id, u.auth_source as u_auth_source, u.login as u_login, u.token as u_token, c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_channel uc ON u.id=uc.user_id LEFT JOIN channels c ON c.id=uc.channel_id WHERE u.token=#{token}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (source_id, auth_source, login, token) VALUES (#{sourceId}, #{authSource}, #{login}, #{token})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET token=#{token} WHERE id=#{id}
